ProjectTitle: Unraveling the molecular mechanisms underlying cell cycle regulation in pre-implantation embryos.

4. Documentation
I assume your documentation (research design, protocol, context of data collection, data collection methods,
quality control procedures, processing and analysis procedures)  will also exist in digital format, not just on paper (hardcopy)?
Metadata standards: you can find suggestions / tips here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata/life_sciences
7. Data archiving / sharing
Do you know which data repositories you would use? Suggestions for your kind of data:
- imaging data: https://rdmkit.elixir-europe.org/bioimaging_data#data-publication-and-archiving
- biomolecular data: https://elixir-europe.org/platforms/data/elixir-deposition-databases
- plasmids: https://www.addgene.org/ 
- else KU Leuven RDR (research data repository): https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
